mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFORMATION SET USER_LEVEL = '작가' WHERE EMAIL = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT LOWER(CATEGORY_NAME) FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = (SELECT CATEGORY_CODE FROM WEBTOON WHERE WEBTOON_CODE = #{value})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EPISODE(EPISODE_SEQUENCE, EPISODE_NUMBER, HITS, RECOMMENDATION, UPLOAD_DATE, WEBTOON_CODE, EPISODE_TITLE, AUTHOR_WORD, THUMBNAIL, FUND_CODE) VALUES(EPISODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{episodeNumber}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{webtoonCode}, #{episodeTitle}, #{authorWord}, #{thumbnail}, null)
mapper.select: SELECT EPISODE_SEQUENCE FROM EPISODE WHERE WEBTOON_CODE = #{webtoonCode} AND EPISODE_NUMBER = #{episodeNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE(IMAGE_INDEX, EPISODE_SEQUENCE, FILE_NAME) VALUES(#{imageIndex}, #{episodeSequence}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE IMAGE SET FILE_NAME = #{fileName} WHERE IMAGE_INDEX = #{imageIndex} and EPISODE_SEQUENCE = #{episodeSequence}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_INDEX = #{imageIndex} and EPISODE_SEQUENCE = #{episodeSequence}
